description: PIMS 3056 CC FSP: Rem Barriers to Greenhouse Gas Emissio

subproject.corporate outcome: Development plans and programmes integrate environmentally sustainable solutions in a manner that promotes poverty reduction, MDG achievement and low-emission climate-resilient development
subproject.description:
Institutional capacities and capabilities of municipalities strengthened through improved policies and practices related to energy services and environment.
Local authorities (oblast, rayon, municipality) use energy service company (ESCO) business model providing energy solutions to ensure energy savings and payback of the capital investments  to improve energy efficiency of municipal infrastructure
subproject.title: PIMS 3056 CCFSP: ESCO-Rivne
